about.title: The brain behind the
about.quote: I transform complexity into elegant solutions
about.bio: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. With years of experience in projects of all sizes, I lead Octodev with focus on quality, innovation and real results for each client.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Clear your doubts about our development process

cost.question: How much does it cost to develop an app or system?
cost.answer: The price varies according to project complexity. Landing pages start at $150, web systems from $600 and mobile apps from $1,000. We provide free and personalized quotes for each project.

timeline.question: What is the delivery timeline?
timeline.answer: Landing pages: 5-10 days. Simple web systems: 2-4 weeks. Complex apps and systems: 4-12 weeks. We work with weekly sprints and you follow all progress.

maintenance.question: Do you provide maintenance after delivery?
maintenance.answer: Yes! We offer 30 days of free support after delivery. After that, we have monthly maintenance plans that include updates, fixes and small improvements.

process.question: How does the development process work?
process.answer: We start with a meeting to understand your needs. Then, we send a detailed proposal. Once approved, we begin development with weekly deliveries for you to follow. At the end, we test and adjust until your approval.

payment.question: Do I need to pay everything upfront?
payment.answer: No. We work with 50% on approval and 50% on delivery. For larger projects, we can split into more installments according to deliveries.

technology.question: What technologies do you work with?
technology.answer: We work with the most modern technologies on the market: React, Next.js, React Native, Node.js, TypeScript, Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB and integrations with various APIs (payments, WhatsApp, CRMs, etc).

satisfaction.question: What if I don't like the result?
satisfaction.answer: We make unlimited revisions during development. You approve each stage before we move forward. Our satisfaction rate is 100% because we prioritize clear communication and aligned deliveries.

companySize.question: What size companies do you serve?
companySize.answer: We serve from individual entrepreneurs to medium-sized companies. Each project receives personalized attention, regardless of size.

contact.title: Let's get your project off the ground?
contact.subtitle: Free quote with no commitment. Guaranteed response within 24 hours.

guarantee.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: If you're not 100% satisfied with the result, we make the necessary changes at no additional cost until your final approval.

footer.tagline: Software development that embraces your business. Web, mobile and integration solutions.
